name: b.om
description: given by Lett et al. 2000 (in CLM4.5)

name: k.sat
description: Hydraulic conductivity at saturation; value taken from Bonan p. 120

name: MWrat
description: ratio molecular weight of water vapor/dry air

name: psi.fc
description: soil water potential at field capacity

name: psi.sat
description: -40.5 cm H2O in Bonan book p. 120 converted to Pa

name: psi.ep
description: -40.5 cm H2O in Bonan book p. 120 converted to Pa

name: SD
description: soil sampling depth/depth of soil layer [m]; from site data

name: SOC
description: soil organic carbon; sum over layers from site data

name: Theta.sat
description: Volumetric water content at saturation; value taken from Bonan p. 120 (soil defined as clay based on grain size of climate data)
